Got Questions?

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about our VPS hosting services.

Getting started is easy! Download our mobile app from the App Store or Google Play, create an account, and you can deploy your first VPS in under a minute. Our intuitive interface guides you through selecting your plan, choosing your operating system, and configuring your server.
We support AlmaLinux (8.10, 9.4), CentOS 7.9, Ubuntu 24.04, and Windows Server 2022. Choose the operating system that best fits your needs during deployment.
Yes! You can upgrade your VPS resources at any time directly from the mobile app or web dashboard. We do not support downsizing the VPS, but you can scale horizontally by adding more VPS instances to distribute your workload.
We accept credit/debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), Apple Pay, Alipay, and cryptocurrencies. All payments are processed securely through our PCI-compliant payment system.

Still have questions? We're here to help.
